text: Hey, using <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/variables#menu-node-variables> any way for me to get the Meta Description of the page? I want to add short descriptions to my mega nav.
Wasn't quite what I needed, but you gave me a little inspiration;

`{% for subchild in child.children %}`
                  `{% if loop.first %}`

                  `<div class="col-3">`
                    `{{subchild.label}}`

                  `</div>`
                  `<div class="col-9">`
                    `<div class="row align-items-start">`
                      `{% else %}`
                      `<div class="col-4 pb-4">`
                        `<a class="dropdown-item" href="{{subchild.id}}">{{subchild.label}}</a>`
                        `{% set my_content = content_by_id(subchild.pageId) %}`
                        `<p>x {{ my_content.meta_description }}</p>`
                      `</div>`
                    `{% endif %}`

                `{% endfor %}`
It is like python. Single quotes or double quotes are fine

Hi guys
i need to remove the alphabet sequence rendering the blog topic in blog how can i do it? can you please help me ?
